name: DMMultiDelegatesProxy
summary: Multiple delegate architecture made using NSProxy both for iOS and OSX
description: DMMultiDelegatesProxy is an NSProxy which allows you to set multiple delegates to any object. Provided example show how to register two classes for some UIScrollView's delegate events; it' pretty easy. A detailed intro is available [into this post](http://danielemargutti.com/in/multiple-delegates-in-objective-c/)
